name: LightningWorks Portal - NFT Comic Books and Games

metadata.name: LightningWorks Portal - NFT Comic Books and Games - Common
metadata.description:
A collection of *777 portals* made by *Marvel & DC Artists* giving holders access to the *LightningWorks entertainment ecosystem.  This includes FREE Comics, Web3 Gaming, various Apps, and distribution rights to our interactive NFT comic titles*.

See [www.lightningworks.io](https://www.lightningworks.io) for more information.
